text: Áron Fejős (born 17 April 1997, in Senta) is a Hungarian football player who currently plays for Paksi FC. ==Career== ===Paks=== On 6 August 2016, Fejős played his first match for Paks in a 0-0 drawn against Ferencváros in the Hungarian League. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;
